meanings.sent1: The products were exportable to other countries.
meanings.sent2: The company focused on creating exportable goods.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a banana phone may not be exportable, but it sure is funny!
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter was as exportable as a box of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors made the painting truly exportable to art collectors.

meanings.sent1: The machinery was too heavy to be exportable.
meanings.sent2: The software was easily exportable to different devices.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fit an elephant in a suitcase is definitely not exportable!
